content:
CS 260P - Fundamentals of Algorithms with Applications

Professor: Michael T. Goodrich, DBH 4091
Office hours: TTh 3:30-4:30pm, DBH 4091 (shared)
(physical/electronic meetings can also be scheduled via email)

Lectures: TTh, 6:30-7:50pm, SH 174
Lab: F, 4:00-4:50pm, SH 174

TA: James Liu
Office hours: M, 2:30-3:20pm, F 2:00-3:00pm, DBH 4061

  • Announcement(s):

    • Midterm I: Thursday, April 25, in class. Reading: Goodrich-Tamassia, Chapters 1-11 (with emphasis on 8-11)
      There is a set of Study questions available.
    • Dr. Goodrich will not be holding office hours on Thursday, May 16.
    • Midterm II: Thursday, May 16, in class. Reading: Goodrich-Tamassia, Chapters 12-14
      There is a set of Study questions available.
    • Final (comprehensive): Thursday, June 6, in class. Reading: Goodrich-Tamassia, Chapters 8-18
      There is a set of Study questions available.

  • Course Syllabus.

  • Homework Assignments and Projects.

  • Course Notes.
